entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 31.
